en-US.summary: Tidebreak is a living novel; you can be anyone or do anything in this open-world audiobook. You control the action!
examplePhrases: Alexa, open Tidebreak and move into the cave
en-US.name: Tidebreak
en-US.description:
The first "living novel" ever invented, Tidebreak brings the classical 'Choose Your Own Adventure' model into a modern era.

It's voice activated and read to you, like an audiobook, but that's hardly worth calling an 'invention.'

What makes Tidebreak special is how you read it. Tidebreak lets you choose your own adventure at any step of the journey and explore chapters at your total convenience, as if you were walking through them. Stop into shops and meet shopkeepers. Have conversations with characters. You make the decision of whether to fight, negotiate, or flee from your sworn enemy -- no matter what your decision, Tidebreak goes on like any living, breathing city, and you live with the consequences. In some ways, it's the answer to 'what happens when you build a massively multiplayer online book.' Whatever it is, it's fun to experience, and we look forward to making you a citizen.
